Name: COG (Center Of Gravity)
About the game: Destroy asteroids and run up the score against your friends in COG (Center of Gravity), a stunning VR homage to the classic arcade game, Asteroids. You are at the center of the VR action, a swirling ring of asteroids on the edge of planetary ring. Armed with a Gravity Ball, you must hit and deflect your weapon to target and destroy asteroids before your time runs out.
